alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 01 at 7:02PM CST until January 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Bitterly Cold Wind Chills Tonight... .Snow is winding down over southwest Wisconsin and should end before midnight. Bitterly cold wind chills will overspread the area tonight with values in the -25 to-35 degree range by the morning. ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...The coldest wind chill values will be towards sunrise, but dangerously cold values will be present through the night and morning hours. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
